snippet: The complicated relationship between American and Mexican soccer fans took an unusual turn when Mexico dodged elimination in qualifying for the World Cup thanks to a United States victory.
abstract: Complicated relationship between American and Mexican soccer fans takes an unusual turn as Mexico dodges elimination in qualifying for the World Cup thanks to United States victory over Panama.

byline.contributor: Paulina Villegas contributed from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: The complicated relationship between American and Mexican soccer fans took an unusual turn when Mexico dodged elimination in qualifying for the World Cup thanks to a United States victory.

headline.main: Red, White and Blue Reprieve for Mexico
headline.print_headline: Red, White And Blue Reprieve For Mexico
